name: dark color
description: This is a casual game where players use directional keys to control the movement of characters, evade incoming attackers, and strive for longer survival time and higher game scores. The art style is exquisite, and the music is passionate. On the gray textured ground, pixel figures stand in place waiting and can only make movements to the left or right. There are constantly animals such as elk, wolf dog, and puppy appearing, and Pixel Little Man needs to avoid these animals. Come and give it a try!
